Apple___Apple_scab.description: Fungal disease causing dark, scabby lesions on leaves and fruit
Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Dark olive-green to black spots on leaves, fruit deformation and cracking

Apple___Black_rot.description: Serious fungal disease causing fruit rot and leaf spots
Apple___Black_rot.symptoms: Brown to black rot on fruit, leaf spots with purple borders

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.description: Fungal disease causing orange spots on leaves
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.symptoms: Bright orange spots on upper leaf surface, yellow spots on fruit

Apple___healthy.description: Plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms

Corn_(maize)_Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_l.description: Fungal disease causing rectangular gray lesions on leaves
Corn_(maize)_Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_l.symptoms: Rectangular gray-brown lesions with parallel sides on leaves

Corn_(maize)Common_rust.description: Fungal disease causing rust-colored pustules on leaves
Corn_(maize)Common_rust.symptoms: Circular to oval rust-colored pustules on both leaf surfaces

Corn_(maize)_Northern_Leaf_Blight.description: Fungal disease causing large, cigar-shaped lesions on leaves
Corn_(maize)_Northern_Leaf_Blight.symptoms: Large, cigar-shaped gray-green lesions on leaves

Corn_(maize)_healthy.description: Plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms

Pepper,bell__Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial disease causing dark spots on leaves and fruit
Pepper,bell__Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Dark brown spots with yellow halos on leaves, scab-like spots on fruit

Pepper,bell__healthy.description: Plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms

Potato___Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing dark spots with concentric rings on leaves
Potato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark spots with concentric rings on leaves, stem lesions, tuber rot

Potato___Late_blight.description: Serious fungal disease that can destroy entire crops rapidly
Potato___Late_blight.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves, white fungal growth, tuber rot

Potato___healthy.description: Plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial disease causing dark spots on leaves and fruit
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Dark brown spots with yellow halos on leaves, raised spots on fruit

Tomato___Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing dark spots with target-like patterns
Tomato___Early_blight.symptoms: Concentric ring patterns on leaves, stem cankers, fruit rot

Tomato___Late_blight.description: Devastating fungal disease that can destroy crops quickly
Tomato___Late_blight.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions, white fungal growth, rapid plant death

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.description: Fungal disease causing yellow patches and fuzzy growth on leaves
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.symptoms: Yellow patches on upper leaf surface, fuzzy growth on underside

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.description: Fungal disease causing small, circular spots with dark borders
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.symptoms: Small circular spots with dark borders and gray centers

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.description: Pest infestation causing stippled, yellowing leaves
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.symptoms: Stippled yellowing leaves, fine webbing, tiny moving dots

Tomato___Target_Spot.description: Fungal disease causing circular spots with concentric rings
Tomato___Target_Spot.symptoms: Circular spots with concentric rings, target-like appearance

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.description: Viral disease causing yellowing and curling of leaves
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.symptoms: Upward curling of leaves, yellowing, stunted growth

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.description: Viral disease causing mottled, mosaic-like patterns on leaves
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.symptoms: Mottled light and dark green patterns on leaves, fruit discoloration

Tomato___healthy.description: Plant appears healthy with no visible disease symptoms
